Paragraph: The PSCs were fabricated with a structure of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / active layer / LiF / Al , where the polymers ( P1- P7 ) were used as electron donors and PC71BM ( or PC61BM ) was used as an electron acceptor.

| PEDOT : PSS |

| PC61BM |
| LiF |
| Al |
